website_summaries.verdict: Doorbot is an excellent idea poorly executed -- hold off for now and hope that this glitchy device improves with time.
pros: BOT Home Automation's Doorbot is a doorbell, camera, and intercom hybrid
Use the related Doorbot app to see live video of whoever just buzzed your front door and chat with them via two-way talk
cons: The video quality is lacking and the app's "hold to talk" button is inconsistent at best

customer_reviews.title: D O N ' T  B U Y  T H I S  P R O D U C T !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product specially states "Quick and easy setup - Have your DoorBot mounted and synced to your personal Wi-Fi network in minutes". This is not true. Advanced knowledge of WI FI routers is needed. The use of Quick and Easy is, I believe, deliberately misleading to sell the product. Then you go to the web site for support. There isn't even a support page. Just a lousy user forum of people who seem as pissed off as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: a half-truth (Fraud)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ítem, it looks and it is easy to set up like is supposed to, BUT I was really disapointed when I found that I need to buy a year suscription to see how the video and intercom works (and that is not clear in the description in the website) which means that just the "ring" works. If Amazon want to continue selling this ítems, Please be clear and honest about the features of the item. I have been amazon's client for a long time and this has never happen
customer_reviews.author: Avid Alexander Saravia Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Video Quality is not very good..
customer_reviews.text: Video Quality is not very good... frequent disconnections even with a decent wifi signals... Mounting on uneven brick surface is very tricky... even a very slight bend will make the unit lose contact with the power (from door bell) thus will drain battery... and won't ring your in-house door bell. Now they came up with the new model (Ring)... not sure if they are any better (I think it has motion detection now), I wished they offer a trade in for people who invest in them early on... I do like that now it saves the video on their cloud, and allows you to download it to your smartphone
customer_reviews.author: dkarjadi

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time. We would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: In fact, my wife wants a refund. Where to begin? As others have said, great idea, just doesn't work very well and is certainly not worth $300. After resolving all of the issues (well documented in other reviews) it comes down to this for us: we can't hear the thing when someone rings/beeps. This includes a 5S, a 4S and two Ipads. The volume the device generates is simply not loud enough for us to hear. The website argues that it is the issue with the phone, etc volume setting but that simply isn't true. What we do in fact hear is the person knocking loudly on the door. That-we can hear.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Berman

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea - Didn't Work - Returned to Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy - but microphone was so scratchy you couldn't hear any voice. Image never worked. Nice idea - too bad it just doesn't work. I am returning it and that process was very easy with Amazon. They might want to consider just not shipping them in the first place since so many people seem to have similar issues with this product. They now have their new 'Ring' version - but after this horrible product I'd be very cautious spending even more money for the new and improved version. Hopefully someone will get this idea right - will only buy a similar product after reading all reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gungo

customer_reviews.title: A Waist of Money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse purchase I have ever made from Amazon. What a rip off! It was impossible to connect to the Internet but most importantly no tech support available for this item. I decided to return this item for the RING doorbell. OMG what a difference in technology! It took no time to set up and install. It has great features. You can scan activity at your front door, it allows you to monitor recent activity and you can change your motion settings. What an improvement! Now I am just waiting for my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda W

customer_reviews.title: V1 was a beta at best.
customer_reviews.text: This model was never ready for prime time. Despite firmware updates and TS help, it never quite worked from a distance, nor did the battery life improve. There is a new model and name, but information comparing this to the old model in terms of reliability is sparse. There is also no program to help the abandoned early adopters from V1 - changing your name won't change your reputation! This is a great idea- like teleportation- that does not achieve utility.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Martin

customer_reviews.title: I paid a Beta tester tax to own this thing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing never worked very well, and ultimately the button stuck, making it useless. The company did give me the new version at a discount, but if you include the price of this unit, it was expensive. The video was great when it worked, but that wasn't often. The battery wouldn't hold a charge and the firmware would never upgrade. The company tried to support it, but even when i put it on top of my router, it wouldn't stay connected. The newer version looks nicer, has more features, and is flawless.

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy- not a dependable solution

The new one was better and the tech support people said the servers they have at doorbot are to slow and need to be updated. I keep the unit since it was 199. Maybe it will work in future. What people say on line about the unit is true. It is a toy!

Checked it with my Android phone as well as with an I Phone, same result. Btw camera quality is lousy. 720 p better 1080 should be standard. Did not connect Doorbot to my doorbell cables, so I can not say if this works.

I went to a more elaborate door bell system that can integrate with my current automation system and NVR for recording. If they can improve on this product I think it will be one to look for in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Now if only it worked regularly...

Maybe someday Doorbot will be ready.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept, and I hoped it would work. Don't waste your time, and don't destroy your outside mounting location for this not ready for primetime product. I had mixed results. Sometimes it would notify me within seconds. However most of the time there was a significant delay from the time the doorbot was pressed and when a notification was received (10-50 seconds). I ended up returning it after a week, and now have to repair the location it was mounted in.

customer_reviews.author: Paulo Cox

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased DoorBot to keep an eye on who pays a visit to our home when we are away, while also enjoying the convenience of not having to get up every time we have a visitor. It’s delivered on both of those wis3hes and really we can’t imagine our home/lives without the DoorBot. We’ve recommended it to our neighbors and to our FedEx driver we love it so much! Pleased with the picture quality although the volume could be a bit louder. Peace of mind comes from knowing that it just plain works and we can rely on it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been waiting for months to try this product after hearing about it through a friend. The instructions and syncing was fairly simple and the unit is running smoothly. The camera adjustment is a smart concept considering each homeowner has a different doorbell setup. If I don't happen to have my cell phone on me, I love that I can still hear the doorbell ring. Perfect addition to my house and it's fun to have friends check it out each time they walk in!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce W Maddock

customer_reviews.title: Doorbot is how doorbells should work!  SUPER COOL
customer_reviews.text: I have a front door that does not have a keyhole in it to see who is at the front door. Doorbot has been AMAZING in our house for seeing who is at the door whether we are standing near the door or we are somewhere else out of the house or somewhere in the house away from the front door. We always seem to be running late to meet people at our house and it is really easy to talk directly to our guest, housecleaner, postal service, etc. when they ring the doorbell. Very impressed with Doorbot!
customer_reviews.author: Saar

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use, now I never miss the doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, customer support was great, I had another similar product from a different company that just refused to work so I returned and purchased a doorbot. Couldn’t be happier with my decision! We get EVERYTHING delivered to our home from our pet’s medicine, our medicine to groceries using Amazon Fresh. Happy to report that we haven’t missed one package since!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: It's gotten better...
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of trouble with my doorbot at first, but lately it seems to be working about 50% of the time. Not great by any means, but not terrible either. I'm upping my review.
customer_reviews.author: GG I

customer_reviews.title: Great Device but Doorbell Issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept, and I had no problem with the installation, firmware update, or wireless network connection. It produces a surprisingly good picture and audio, however, the device needs to draw a small amount of current from the doorbell circuit, causing some electronic doorbells to malfunction. Contacted DoorBot customer support and they allowed me to return it for a full refund.

customer_reviews.title: Doorbot Wi-Fi Enabled Smart Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly, I love being able to answer the doorbell on my iphone or ipad!

They were very helpful and responded quickly (less than a hour). We live in a cold climate, so am waiting to see how it functions this winter, otherwise would have rated it five stars.

product_meta.title: Doorbot Wi-Fi Enabled Smart Doorbell (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Doorbot - The doorbell for smartphone and tablets. Doorbot is a video intercom for your smartphones and tablets. See and talk with visitors using your smartphones and tablets. Whether you're in the house or halfway around the world, DoorBot works from anywhere. DoorBot is quick and easy to set up as it mounts and syncs in minutes. DoorBot has a built in battery, however, it can also be powered through your existing doorbell wiring. By wiring DoorBot, anytime someone rings the DoorBot it will also chime the doorbell. If your DoorBot is stolen we will give you another one for free. DoorBot is night vision enabled, has an adjustable camera and connects to your existing Wi-Fi.

AMAZON.COM


DoorBot is a Wi-Fi-enabled video doorbell that allows you to see and speak with visitors through your smartphone from anywhere in the world.


Talk with visitors


See your guests


Works with iOS & Android 

See larger image. 

PRODUCT FEATURES


DUAL POWER
DoorBot can operate wirelessly on the internal battery for over a year before needing another charge. It can also be powered through your existing doorbell wiring. By wiring DoorBot, anytime someone rings the DoorBot it will also chime the doorbell.



WORKS FROM ANYWHERE
Whether you're in the kitchen or halfway around the world, you'll always be able to answer the door from the palm of your hand. It even works when your phone is roaming on cellular networks.



QUICK AND EASY SETUP
Have your DoorBot mounted and synced in minutes without any professional help, or additional tools.



WEATHER RESISTANT
DoorBot is outdoor approved and built to withstand humidity, rain, sleet, snow, ice, and extreme heat.



THEFT GUARANTEE
In addition to the included security mounting bracket, you'll get the ultimate peace of mind: if your DoorBot is stolen, it will be replaced it free of charge.



PAIR MULTIPLE DEVICES
There's no limit to the number of smartphones and tablets you can connect to DoorBot. When you have a visitor, DoorBot will simultaneously ring all of your connected devices.






CAMERA ROTATION
DoorBot's adjustable camera allows you to position the lens to fit your particular configuration. With DoorBot's built-in night vision, you can rely on clear audio and video quality around the clock.
